Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.compression

Class HuffmanCoding.Node

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.compression.HuffmanCoding.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<HuffmanCoding.Node>
Enclosing class:
HuffmanCoding
public static class HuffmanCoding.Node extends Object implements Comparable<HuffmanCoding.Node>
Represents a node in a Huffman tree used for encoding symbols based on their frequency. Each Node can either be a leaf node containing a symbol or an internal node linking to child nodes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Node(int frequency, String symbol, HuffmanCoding.Node zero, HuffmanCoding.Node one)
    Constructs a Node object representing a single node in a Huffman tree, with information about frequency, symbol, and its child nodes.
    Node(String symbol, int frequency)
    Constructs a Node object representing a single node in a Huffman tree, initialized with a symbol and its frequency.

  • Constructor Details

    • Node

      public Node(int frequency, String symbol, HuffmanCoding.Node zero, HuffmanCoding.Node one)
      Constructs a Node object representing a single node in a Huffman tree, with information about frequency, symbol, and its child nodes.
      Parameters:
      frequency - the frequency of the symbol associated with this node
      symbol - the symbol represented by this node, or a composite symbol if this node combines two or more symbols
      zero - the left child node, representing the binary value 0
      one - the right child node, representing the binary value 1

    • Node

      public Node(String symbol, int frequency)
      Constructs a Node object representing a single node in a Huffman tree, initialized with a symbol and its frequency.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol represented by this node, or a composite symbol if this node combines two or more symbols
      frequency - the frequency of the symbol associated with this node

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(HuffmanCoding.Node o)
      Compares this Node with the specified Node for order based on their frequency values.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<HuffmanCoding.Node>
      Parameters:
      o - the Node to be compared with this Node.
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this Node's frequency is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified Node's frequency.

    • isLeaf

      public boolean isLeaf()
      Determines if the current node is a leaf node in the Huffman tree. A leaf node does not have any child nodes.
      Returns:
      true if the current node is a leaf node (i.e., both child nodes are null), false otherwise.

    • dfs

      public void dfs(BiFunction<Object,Integer,Object> depthFunction, BiConsumer<HuffmanCoding.Node,Object> consumer, Object depthIndicator, Integer branch)
      Performs a depth-first search (DFS) traversal on the Huffman tree starting from the current node. This method applies the given depth function and consumer action to each node during the traversal.
      Parameters:
      depthFunction - a function that calculates the depth or context for the current node based on the previous depth indicator and the branch value. The branch value can be 0 or 1 to indicate the path taken.
      consumer - a consumer that performs an operation with the current node and the calculated depth.
      depthIndicator - an initial value or context passed to the depth function, typically representing the starting point for calculating the depth or state in the traversal.
      branch - the indicator for the branch (binary path) being traversed. It can be null for the root node or 0/1 for child nodes.
